name: FAMILY: A Print & Play Fiasco Playset
name_original: FAMILY: A Print & Play Fiasco Playset
description:
THE SCORE

Something insidious has wormed it’s way into our family: a STAIN that threatens to consume us all.

When it arrived we tried to ignore it, to pretend it wasn’t happening until we simply couldn’t take it any longer.

We may not have created it, we sure as hell didn’t invite it in, but it’s our problem now and it’s here to stay.

Will we band together as a family to clean up this mess or fall apart under generations of dead weight?


THE DETAILS

FAMILY is a fan playset for Fiasco 2.0

Players will discover the dark truth behind THE STAIN that stalks the Wilson family in one of three scenarios inspired by the genre-bending works of Bong Joon Ho (The Host) and Jordan Peele (Us).

Requires the basic Fiasco 2.0 game to play.

For 3-4 players.

1-3 hour playtime.

Contains adult themes.

FIASCO™ and the FIASCO™ logo are trademarks of Bully Pulpit Games LLC.
